languages.text: "Объявите Блаженных собственностью Ордена Молота. Пусть продолжают служить верующим".
"Pronounce the Touched the property of the Order of the Hammer. Let them continue to serve the faithful."
languages.original_text: "Объявите Блаженных собственностью Ордена Молота. Пусть продолжают служить верующим".

traits.locale_text: "Pronounce the Blessed the property of the Order of the Hammer. Let them continue to serve the believers."
"Pronounce the Blessed the property of the Order of the Hammer. Let them continue to serve the believers."
"Pronounce the Touched the property of the Order of the Hammer. Let them continue to serve the faithful."
"Pronounce the Touched the property of the Order of the Hammer. Let them continue to serve the believers."

"Pronounce the Touched the property of the Order of the Hammer. Let them continue to serve the faithful."
"Pronounce the Touched the property of the Order of the Hammer. Let them continue to serve the faithful."

languages.text: “宣布受召者为重锤修会的财产，让他们继续服侍信徒。”
languages.original_text: "Pronounce the Touched the property of the Order of the Hammer. Let them continue to serve the faithful."

traits.locale_text: “宣布受召者为重锤修会的财产，让他们继续服侍信徒。”
“宣布受召者为重锤修会的财产，让他们继续服侍信徒。”

languages.text: «Declare que los Tocados son propiedad de la Orden del Martillo. Que continúen sirviendo a los fieles».
languages.original_text: "Pronounce the Touched the property of the Order of the Hammer. Let them continue to serve the faithful."

traits.locale_text: «Declare que los Tocados son propiedad de la Orden del Martillo. Que continúen sirviendo a los fieles».

languages.text: 「触れられし者を鉄槌の修道会の所有物とする。彼らに信者への奉仕を続けるように促すのだ」
languages.original_text: "Pronounce the Touched the property of the Order of the Hammer. Let them continue to serve the faithful."

traits.locale_text: 「触れられし者を鉄槌の修道会の所有物とする。彼らに信者への奉仕を続けるように促すのだ」
「触れられし者を鉄槌の修道会の所有物とする。彼らに信者への奉仕を続けるように促すのだ」

languages.text: « Décrétez que les Altérés appartiennent désormais à l'Ordre du Marteau. Ils peuvent continuer à servir les croyants. »
languages.original_text: "Pronounce the Touched the property of the Order of the Hammer. Let them continue to serve the faithful."

traits.locale_text: « Décrétez que les Altérés appartiennent désormais à l'Ordre du Marteau. Ils peuvent continuer à servir les croyants. »

languages.text: "Erklärt die Berührten zum Eigentum des Ordens des Hammers. Lasst sie weiterhin den Gläubigen dienen."
languages.original_text: "Pronounce the Touched the property of the Order of the Hammer. Let them continue to serve the faithful."

traits.locale_text: "Erklärt die Berührten zum Eigentum des Ordens des Hammers. Lasst sie weiterhin den Gläubigen dienen."
"Erklärt die Berührten zum Eigentum des Ordens des Hammers. Lasst sie weiterhin den Gläubigen dienen."

languages.text: "Mütehassislerin Çekiç Tarikatı'na ait olduğunu duyurun. İnançlılara hizmet etmeyi sürdürsünler."
languages.original_text: "Pronounce the Touched the property of the Order of the Hammer. Let them continue to serve the faithful."

traits.locale_text: "Mütehassislerin Çekiç Tarikatı'na ait olduğunu duyurun. İnançlılara hizmet etmeyi sürdürsünler."
